changes.description: Changed shadow-sm to shadow, added hover:shadow-md and transition-shadow duration-200 for interactive depth effect. Added border-t to CardFooter.

Increased title from text-base to text-lg. Grouped Edit, Delete, and Logs buttons into a dropdown menu using MoreVertical icon. Kept Run and Test as primary visible buttons. Increased icon sizes to h-4.
Changed grid gap from gap-4 to gap-6. Changed xl:grid-cols-4 to xl:grid-cols-3 for larger cards.
